children.label: 页面
children.script:
const that = this
let toastDom = document.createElement('div')
toastDom.className = 'luck-toast'
toastDom.style.position = 'fixed'
toastDom.style.zIndex = 10
toastDom.style.top = 0
toastDom.style.left = 0
toastDom.style.width = '100%'
toastDom.style.height = '100%'
toastDom.style.background = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)'
toastDom.style.display = 'none'
toastDom.style.justifyContent = 'center'
toastDom.style.alignItems = 'center'
document.body.appendChild(toastDom)
let imgWrapDom = document.createElement('div')
imgWrapDom.style.position = 'relative'
imgWrapDom.style.width = '351px'
imgWrapDom.style.height = '214px'
imgWrapDom.style.marginTop = '-100px'
toastDom.appendChild(imgWrapDom)
let imgDom = document.createElement('img')
imgDom.src = 'https://s21.lgstatic.com/growth/activity/20210310/1615363774799.png'
imgDom.style.width = '100%'
imgWrapDom.appendChild(imgDom)
let closeDom = document.createElement('div')
closeDom.style.position = 'absolute'
closeDom.style.top = 0
closeDom.style.left = '20px'
closeDom.style.width = '45px'
closeDom.style.height = '45px'
closeDom.addEventListener('click', () => {
  toastDom.style.display = 'none'
})
imgWrapDom.appendChild(closeDom)
that.$nextTick(() => {
  const mySwiper = document.querySelector('#root>.swiper-container').swiper
  const pageDom = document.getElementById(that.node.id)
  let yStart = 0
  let yEnd = 0
  pageDom.addEventListener('touchstart', (e) => {
    let event1 = event || e
    yStart = event1.touches[0].pageY & event1.changedTouches[0].pageY & event1.targetTouches[0].pageY
  })
  pageDom.addEventListener('touchend', (e) => {
    let event1 = event || e
    yEnd = event1.changedTouches[0].pageY
    if (yStart - yEnd > 30) {
      mySwiper.slideTo(1, 1000, false)
    }
  })
})
